CreateOutpost.name: CreateOutpost
CreateOutpost.description: Grants permission to create an Outpost

DeleteOutpost.name: DeleteOutpost
DeleteOutpost.description: Grants permission to delete an outpost

DeleteSite.name: DeleteSite
DeleteSite.description: Grants permission to delete an site

GetOutpost.name: GetOutpost
GetOutpost.description: Grants permission to get information about the specified Outpost

GetOutpostInstanceTypes.name: GetOutpostInstanceTypes
GetOutpostInstanceTypes.description: Grants permission to list the instance types for the specified Outpost

ListOutposts.name: ListOutposts
ListOutposts.description: Grants permission to list the Outposts for your AWS account

ListSites.name: ListSites
ListSites.description: Grants permission to list the sites for your AWS account
